sections.title: Project Overview and Requirements
sections.topic_elaboration: Discuss the overall goals, constraints, and requirements for the CountYourWords project.

sections.title: System Architecture
sections.topic_elaboration: Describe the high-level architecture of the CountYourWords system, including its main components and their interactions.

sections.title: Core System Components
sections.topic_elaboration: Detail the key components that make up the CountYourWords application, such as the parser, word counter, and test framework.

sections.title: Data Storage Layer
sections.topic_elaboration: Explain how data is stored and managed within the CountYourWords system, including any databases or file systems used.

sections.title: Testing Strategy
sections.topic_elaboration: Describe the testing approach for the CountYourWords project, including unit tests and integration tests.

sections.title: Dependencies and Libraries
sections.topic_elaboration: List and describe the external libraries used in the CountYourWords project, such as JUnit for testing.

sections.title: Deployment and Configuration
sections.topic_elaboration: Discuss how the CountYourWords application is deployed and configured in a production environment.
